Description:
Location: Dubai, AE
Level of experience: 10-15 years SYSTRA is one of the world's leading engineering and consultancy groups specialising in public transport and sustainable mobility. With over 9,600 employees, SYSTRA's mission is to design safe and sustainable transport solutions to bring people together, develop social inclusion and facilitate access to employment, education and leisure throughout the world. + Coordinate external audits and work with auditors.
